sections.heading: Bonds; endorsement of approval required
sections.text: The approval of each official bond shall be endorsed upon such bond by the officer approving the same, and no bond shall be filed and recorded until so approved.SourceLaws 1881, c. 13, ยง 11, p. 97;R.S.1913, ยง 5717;C.S.1922, ยง 5047;C.S.1929, ยง 12-111;R.S.1943,
